ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars: News on Events Page
ygData.msgSnippet: I have decided that the Events page, will go under go mass change. Instead of putting every little detail that has no importance (IE, no offense intended:

Received: from KSLawdogg@... by csimo01.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v26.7.) id a.73.3d1259d (3313) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Fri, 2 Jun 2000 18:38:57 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID: <73.3d1259d.26699180@...>
Date: Fri, 2 Jun 2000 18:38:56 EDT
Subject: Neo Beast Wars: News on Events Page
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 101
From: KSLawdogg@...

    

    I have decided that the Events page, will go under go mass change.  
Instead of putting every little detail that has no importance (IE, no offense 
intended: Mantella and Drozom falling in love, Quickstrike relishing his 
non-hurting foot).  Things like that.  I'll only be putting down the major 
events, like the Newcomers (Koga Shuko and Set) landing, or the People's base 
being blown sky high by enemy forces.  Or the Alliance base being atacked and 
recieving damage.  I will be doing this for a few reasons:

#1.  The events page only averaged 7 hits a day, and about 2 of them were 
mine when I checked on the page.  

#2.  Summer is only a few weeks away.  When more people get more time to RP, 
the e-mails will most likely double, therefore overrunning Yanshosh and 
myself.

#3.  Just trying to update the page (when some days have over 100 posts) and 
trying to keep up with the events in the RPG, or to act out our characters, 
has become aggrivating and a nearly impossible task for Yanshosh and myself.  
Therfore, with its newly proposed format, it won't take up our time to RP.

#4.  Finally, because the RPG has gotten along fine without it for over a 
year.  


I utterly oppose any response on this e-mail.  There is no need for it.  Any 
comments about the page go to me: KSLawDogg@....  Not reply.  

Thank you,
Lord Unitron AKA SJW
